Key Match Events: Ildemaro Vargas hit a 2-run double in the 9th inning that went in and out of the glove of the Pirates' rightfielder, winning the game for the Nationals
Pre-Game Insights: The Nationals are underdogs today, at +135 to win on the moneyline
The Nationals used Kyle Finnegan for both ends of the doubleheader yesterday for saves
The Nationals are under pressure to exceed win totals projected by various sources
Post-Match Reflections: Nats' manager Dave Martinez praised the team's resilience and hard work
The Nationals avoided the triple-digit loss plateau with the first game win on Saturday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nationals had not swept a doubleheader since April 19, 2022
Dylan Crews, Jacob Young, and James Wood became the 10th, 11th, and 12th Nats' rookies to have at least two extra-base hits and a stolen base in one game
